title: India’s opposition to boycott new parliament inauguration by Modi
selftext:
Leaders let others shine, so who is the leader in India? Modi will do another solo insta photo op while the president was made to inaugurate Modi stadium.

The main photo op event before the election is scheduled for January Ram Mandir.

Do people still get fooled by these PR stunts? Didn’t Vajpayee try the same trick with shining India?
